message.body: Whatcha doing tmw? Wanna come to my kids screening at 1 and then maybe get a milkshake after???
I'm going to need it. This has been seriously terrible.
Ugh. So sorry! What time do u have to get there? I want to do some work but will see. How long?
I think I am going 12-2, gotta make sure the technology works and wanna see some of the other work! I can text you after and see where you are!
Ok. I'm going to lava I think. Depending on what I get done I'll come at 1. Which room again? 8th floor?
It's Hamilton hall, main room. Our screening isn't til 1 but Adams class is before and animation right after! The films are not so good. I can meet you at lava after if you get in a work groove!
That might be good. I really haven't had a chance to work in ages. Or if u want, txt and I can pick u up and we can go somewhere?
Don't shutter too much watching the movies!
Sounds good! Talk to you this afternoon! Good luck workin!
Their parents are gonna be like wtf did we pay for?!
They are terrible!
Haha!!! Do u have to say anything first? Talk about the PROCESS and the EXPERIENCE!
I hope I do. I've planned a whole speech about those things! I am not going to mention how I gave up because their kids are jerks...
Good idea.
Ugh. That was soooo painful! You at Lava?
But you're DONE!!!!! I am at lava, but can also meet u...
I am gonna walk to you! Need to grab something at the apple store first
Ok!
How is changing speed in FCP different than duplicating frames?
I don't think I know what duplicating frames does!
Makes it slower!
You can do that?! Weird
We shouldn't be teachers.
Hahaha. I've been thinking about that so much lately.
